website_summaries.verdict: The Adidas CrazyFlight Bounce 2.0 is a well-rounded women’s volleyball trainer. It ticks all the boxes when it comes to comfort and support. Thus, it is one of the top picks for a lot of players.
pros: The Adidas CrazyFlight Bounce 2.0 is a comfortable athletic footwear, according to a majority of owners
Many volleyball players lauded the lateral support offered by this model
The lightweight nature of the trainer resonated well with numerous people
A good number of athletes liked that this footgear allowed them to wear ankle braces
A lot of sports aficionados appreciated the wide outsole because they felt stable wearing it
Plenty of users liked how flexible this pair of volleyball shoes was
cons: According to a few reviewers, the collar felt loose and did not provide adequate ankle support
The insole has a tendency to pull down a wearer’s sock which annoyed one user
The Adidas volleyball shoe is a bit stiff and needs to be broken, noted a critic

customer_reviews.title: said they were the most comfortable volleyball shoes she's had yet
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these, said they were the most comfortable volleyball shoes she's had yet. The soles really help you not slide too. Will buy another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: Wifey loves them
customer_reviews.text: After a long search for a good looking volleyball shoe for my wife (I noticed that most volley ball’s shoes have ugly designs), I came across these. She absolutely loves them. According to her, they are flexible enough to run in and very stable. I had to get her some Reeboks nano’s because she even started to use them for CrossFit and I didn’t want her to wear them off quickly. Great quality-good looking show for a pretty good price if you ask me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ran at least a half size too big for me.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a size 8 in literally every other shoe I have ever owned or tried on, but these things are huge on my feet. At least a half size, maybe even a whole size. The inside is also a weird texture. If you put your finger on the inside and rub up, it’s almost like a fish scale feeling. I could see that gripping to your socks and pulling them down constantly. I’m returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: best volleyball shoes !
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is very particular about her volleyball shoes and has many pairs of mizuno's. She tried these on and loved them - she said they were the most comfortable ones she has ever had. Adidas did a great job building this shoe
customer_reviews.author: SanDee D

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: My old pair of volleyball shoes were Mizunos and they constantly gave me blisters. These shoes don’t give me blisters at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used these this year for volleyball season and loved them. A lot more comfortable than her mizunos that were twice as much. These even had better grip on the court.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Pretty comfy
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter to use at volleyball, but they were too large, so I ended up wearing them. They are comfy, but a bit high on the leg in the front, so you can feel that after wearing them for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Camelia

customer_reviews.title: Sock Eaters
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these shoes look! HOWEVER they eat my socks and I can’t make it stop! It is so annoying. I have tried so many different kinds of socks. I don’t normally have this problem. So sad.
customer_reviews.author: lauri

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit for me
customer_reviews.text: Sneaker is chunky, I ordered a half size up to make up for the heavier socks but the shoe never felt good on my feet; had to send this pair back, but found another pair that was cheaper and look good on my feet an felt even better.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Clayton

customer_reviews.title: A little bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look so big but my daughter says they fit. She doesn't mind the extra room in the toes. I think we could have gone down a half size but it's hard to tell. It's working for her so no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: MamaLottie

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Size 9 is my daughters usual size, they fit nice with a little wiggle room. Comfortable and they look nice too.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them. She says that they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect volleyball shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter. She absolutely loves them. Perfect for her volleyball games. Trippy for excellent traction and movement. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes
customer_reviews.text: A little big for me so I wear thicker socks and shoe laces come undone often. Other than that comfy shoe
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with size.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return a women’s size 10 for an 8. My daughter wears a 10. Otherwise love the shoes. Improved her game!
customer_reviews.author: Pattie Argo

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoe
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has foot issues ant this shoe is great. She usually complains of her feet hurting after an all day tournament. She played all day Saturday and half day Sunday and no problems with her feet hurting.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Product was just as expected. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and cute sneakers. My daughter needed court shoes for a conditioning class and these are great!
customer_reviews.author: Luke'sMom

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for my daughter's for team volley ball. She says they are comfortable and fit true to her usual size. They do look a bit more gray/silver than they appear to be white in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: sharon bush

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter to play volleyball. They don’t make her jump higher but she absolutely loves them! She loves them so much she only where’s them on the court.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: No boxes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 pairs of shoes and both didn’t come with the original boxes. And the shoes were very dirty when i opened it
customer_reviews.author: ChloeH

customer_reviews.title: They provide excellent support and they look good
customer_reviews.text: My high school sophomore daughter loves these. She plays club and JV Vball. They provide excellent support and they look good.
customer_reviews.author: BDG

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: These are too big. I’d say a full half size. We ordered white and received grey.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Fit As Expected
customer_reviews.text: Writing this review on my dad’s amazon account. They are really nice! I thought they seemed too large for my feet but they actually fit well with a little extra space. I’ve only had these for a day but they seem amazing! Very bouncy
customer_reviews.author: chhay pang

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes felt good right out of the box. My feet hurt a lot! I bought these to play pickleball indoors on carpet or basketball floor courts. The are very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits a size smaller then true to size per women’s sizing.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wears a women’s 7/7.5 and we got a 8.5 and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Schulte

customer_reviews.title: Amazing prize great shipping!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe I got these for that price. My daughter is over the moon. These have awesome support features and really good traction for the court. BTW, shipping was 3 days early.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara H. Llera Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Not expected
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is heavier than other volleyball shoes and the front is very hard. Wasn't as comfortable as expected for a court shoe. It's a heavier feel shoe, so moving quick was difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Twai33

customer_reviews.title: Volleyball Shoes for Indoor Pickleball
customer_reviews.text: These volleyball shoes worked out well for me. I bought them to use to play pickleball indoors. They are super comfy, with no pressure points. I highly recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: LLB

customer_reviews.title: Good price and what I expected
customer_reviews.text: These were required for the volleyball team so they were a must no matter what. Comfy shoes and fit well. My older daughter has a pair and they have held up for two seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: They were a gift but the recipient was very happy and loves them. They run a half size large.
customer_reviews.author: BGP

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and suportive
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my daughter to play volleyball and she loves them! Very true to fit, extremely comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are falling apart after wearing them for the last several months. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Klein

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I played libero and practiced nearly everyday in them for a whole summer and season. These shoes were great and stylish. They were comfortable and held up extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: Kayt

customer_reviews.title: Runs a half size large
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are great, however, they run a little large. A half size smaller would have fit better.
customer_reviews.author: Beth A. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: My daughter says this shoe was the most comfortable volleyball shoe she’s worn. The only problem is that they’re difficult to find.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best grip
customer_reviews.text: Other volleyball shoes seem to grip the court better, but these are comfortable and I love the way they look.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Rusch

customer_reviews.title: Best volleyball shoes!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best volleyball shoes I have ever had!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Great product and seller!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her new VB shoes. The fit and functionality of the shoes was more than she expected. The seller did a great job having my daughter's shoe size and then getting it to me quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Maass

customer_reviews.title: Volleyball shoes are great!
customer_reviews.text: Felt it was risky buying shoes online but they are great and fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. McCardell

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. My daughter loves it. Its lightweight and the appearance is nice. Glad I chose this as her first pair of volleyball shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Auwae

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Has been a great volleyball ball shoe for my daughter
customer_reviews.author: bettypatrick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good ankle support, stylish, cheap, and super comfortable. My favorite volleyball shoes yet!
customer_reviews.author: prettyplease123

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit wonderful. I’m using them for my workouts.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. My daughter gave me the “two thumbs up” approval.
customer_reviews.author: Janizabeth O.

customer_reviews.title: Great Volleyball Shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: The shoe exceeded our expectation. My daughter felt like she can jump to the sky!!
customer_reviews.author: Phala Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and fit was as expect. High end volleyball shoes. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kim merril

product_meta.title: adidas Women's Crazyflight Bounce 2 Shoes
product_meta.description: Designed for players who move around the court quickly and attack the net, these women's volleyball shoes have a feather-light mesh upper reinforced with TPU yarns. A flexible midsole cushions high-impact landings, and the rubber outsole provides outstanding grip on indoor surfaces.
feature_bullets: Cushioned volleyball shoes with outstanding flexibility for lightweight comfort
Mesh upper with TPU yarn reinforcements for support
Bounce cushioning provides enhanced comfort and flexibility
Top-grip rubber outsole provides excellent traction
